name: unplug
content:
unplug verb [T]
(REMOVE PLUG)
Add to word list
Add to word list
to take the plug of a piece of electrical equipment out of the place where it is connected to the electricity supply: Did you unplug the iron?

unplug verb [T]
(REMOVE BLOCKAGE)
US to remove what is blocking something: The video shows you how to unplug a bath drain full of hair.

Add to word list
to remove a plug for an electrical device from a socket: I unplugged the TV.
